# PAD::GET_CONTROL_INSTRUCTIONAL_BUTTONS_STRING

## Summary
Return an encoded string of the icon to show of a CONTROL_ACTION. empty string will be returned on error!

## Parameters
* **CONTROL_TYPE** control
* **CONTROL_ACTION** action
* **BOOL** allowXOSwap = true

## Returns
* **STRING**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
allowXOSwap appears to always be true.

EG:
GET_CONTROL_INSTRUCTIONAL_BUTTON (2, 201, 1) /*INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT (e.g. Enter button)*/
GET_CONTROL_INSTRUCTIONAL_BUTTON (2, 202, 1) /*INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL (e.g. ESC button)*/
GET_CONTROL_INSTRUCTIONAL_BUTTON (2, 51, 1) /*INPUT_CONTEXT (e.g. E button)*/

gtaforums.com/topic/819070-c-draw-instructional-buttons-scaleform-movie/#entry1068197378

control: unused parameter
